name: Pens BOX
description: The Pens Box is crafted from American walnut veneered poplar plywood. It features 3 removable trays, each divided into 7 compartments, allowing it to hold up to 21 pens. Each tray is lined with SC leather by Poltrona Frau with a nubuk Velvety leather bottom by Poltrona Frau, available in 4 color combinations. This luxurious design object merges craftsmanship and quality, reflecting Ceccotti Collezioni's commitment to high-end materials and artisan processes.
